```{r}
library(MeltR)
library(tidyverse)
devtools::load_all()

df = df.absorbance %>% filter(Experiment == "CROWD DP5")

meltR.A.fit = meltR.A(df,
        NucAcid = c("RNA", "ACCGGU"),
        Mmodel = "Homoduplex.2State",
        concT = 80,
        fitTs = c(20, 65),
        Silent = T)
#?BLTrimmer

Trimmed = BLTrimmer(meltR.A.fit,
                    Trim.method = "floating",
                    Assess.method = 3,
                    no.trim.range = c(0.1, 0.9),
                    quantile.threshold = 0.25,
                    n.ranges.float = 5,
                    range.step.float = 5,
                    n.combinations = 1000)


Trimmed$Ensemble.energies


```
